metadata.title: Bring It To Jerome

xml.lyrics:
(Bo Diddley):
Well, every day I work, bringing home my pay
Come to find out baby, you've been giving my money away
Tell me baby, what you tryin' to do?
You ain't seen me hummin', like you used to do
Tell me mama, what's wrong with you?
You know pretty baby, I'm so crazy 'bout you
(Jerome Green):
All you pretty women, bring it to my home
You don't have to worry, I won't do you no wrong
Bring it on home, bring it to Jerome
Bring it on home, bring it to Jerome
Look here pretty baby, this mess I won't stand
All the other women, say you got another man
Bring it on home, bring it to Jerome
Bring it on home, bring it to Jerome
